definition: (in an election with more than 2 options) the number of votes for the candidate or party receiving the greatest number (but less that half of the votes)
details:
noun
- (in an election with more than 2 options) the number of votes for the candidate or party receiving the greatest number (but less that half of the votes)
= synonyms: relative majority
- a large indefinite number
= synonyms: myriad
- the state of being plural
= example: the state of being plural
